executable.title: BRAINSRefacer
executable.description: Deidentify head images without destroying useful facial information
executable.contributor: Alexander Leinoff (alexander-leinoff -at- uiowa.edu), Jeffrey Obadal (jeffrey-obadal -at- uiowa.edu)
executable.acknowledgements: Hans Johnson(1,2,3); Alexander Leinoff(3); Yue Pan(3); Wei Shao(3); Jeffrey Obadal(3) 1=University of Iowa Department of Psychiatry, 2=University of Iowa Department of Biomedical Engineering, 3=University of Iowa Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering

image.label: LabelMap
image.name: labelmap
image.description: A Label Map for the head

file.label: bSpline Transform file name
file.name: bSplineFileName
file.description: A name for the Displaement Field image generated by the bSpline Transform

file.label: premade BSpline
file.name: previousBSplineFileName
file.description: Re use a previously generated BSpline instead of generating a new random one.

parameters.label: Outputs of intermediary steps
parameters.description: Output parameters for intermediary steps. This is so we can see what is going on as the program progresses.

image.label: OutputMask name
image.name: outputMask
image.description: A name for the output mask derived from the Atlas Label map

image.label: Distance Map file name
image.name: distanceMapFileName
image.description: A name for the output mask derived from the Atlas Label map

file.label: final Transform file name
file.name: finalTransformFileName
file.description: A name for the Displaement Field image generated by the final Transform

image.label: bSpline and distance Displacement Map file name
image.name: smoothDisplacementName
image.description: A name for the Displaement Field combined with the distance map

image.label: diffImage output
image.name: diffImageName
image.description: difference of subject image and transformed image

image.label: DeformedImage name
image.name: deformedImageName
image.description: A name for the output of the deformed Image

parameters.label: Control Options
parameters.description: These parameters control the various options

integer.label: Max Random
integer.name: maxRandom
integer.description: The maximum range of randomness of the BSPline

integer.label: Min Random
integer.name: minRandom
integer.description: The minimum range of randomness of the BSPline

double.label: Distance Map Scale
double.name: scaleDistanceMap
double.description: The amount the Distance Map is scaled by

integer.label: BSpline Control Points
integer.name: bsplineControlPoints
integer.description: The number of bspline control points in each direction

boolean.name: reusebspline
boolean.label: ReUse a previously generated BSpline
boolean.description: This will generate the same deformation as a previous one.

boolean.name: babyface
boolean.label: BabyFace
boolean.description: Produces a Squished, baby like face

boolean.name: birdface
boolean.label: BirdFace
boolean.description: Typically produces a narrow, birdlike face with an extended nose

boolean.name: defaultface
boolean.label: DefaultFace
boolean.description: Uses the default parameters to produce a randomly deformed face

boolean.name: setMersenneSeed
boolean.label: Set Mersenne Seed
boolean.description: Use a predetermined value for the mersenne seed

integer.name: mersenneSeed
integer.label: The Mersenne Seed>
integer.description: The predetermined value for the Mersenne seed

boolean.name: printMersenneSeed
boolean.label: Print the Mersenne Seed
boolean.description: You can print the Mersenne Seed in the console to use it again later
